solution_line_template: The total number of ladybugs is {ladybugs_monday} + {ladybugs_tuesday} = <<{ladybugs_monday}+{ladybugs_tuesday}={total_ladybugs}>>{total_ladybugs}
The total number of dots is {total_ladybugs} * {dots_per_ladybug} = <<{total_ladybugs}*{dots_per_ladybug}={total_dots}>>{total_dots}
